name: Today'sparisienbriefnews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
I am a Frenchman who lives in Paris and I have a lot of friends in the US. After they asked me to, I set up a groupe on social networks to communicate everyday a few engaging facts about parisien life (food, museums exhibits...). Today, I want to offer this service to a broader audience, thanks to the direct and intuitive channel that is Alexa. 
As a consequence, I will be offering a new short texte everyday for my audience to hear.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
